TestCase.name: testMultipleFlatteningsTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a$_1=[AS($0._1, 'a$_1')], a$_2=[AS($0._2, 'a$_2')], c=[$2], b$_1=[AS($1._1, 'b$_1')], b$_2=[AS($1._2, 'b$_2')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
Calc(select=[a._1 AS a$_1, a._2 AS a$_2, c, b._1 AS b$_1, b._2 AS b$_2]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testNestedFlattening
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a$_1=[AS($0._1, 'a$_1')], a$_2=[AS($0._2, 'a$_2')], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
Calc(select=[a._1 AS a$_1, a._2 AS a$_2, b]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testScalarFunctionAccess
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(_c0=[AS(org$apache$flink$table$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$defaed77d24c7b5deb0165068716b9fc().my, '_c0')], _c1=[AS(org$apache$flink$table$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$defaed77d24c7b5deb0165068716b9fc().clazz, '_c1')], _c2=[AS(org$apache$flink$table$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$defaed77d24c7b5deb0165068716b9fc().my, '_c2')], _c3=[AS(org$apache$flink$table$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$giveMeCaseClass$$defaed77d24c7b5deb0165068716b9fc().clazz, '_c3')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

Calc(select=[giveMeCaseClass$().my AS _c0, giveMeCaseClass$().clazz AS _c1, giveMeCaseClass$().my AS _c2, giveMeCaseClass$().clazz AS _c3]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b])

TestCase.name: testSelectAllFields
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectAggregationFromGroupedTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(TMP_0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], TMP_0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

Calc(select=[TMP_0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[c], select=[c, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectFromAggregatedPojoTable
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, 2)]) +- LogicalProject(word=[$0], frequency=[AS($1, 'frequency')]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], TMP_0=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(word=[$0], frequency=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

Calc(select=[word, TMP_0 AS frequency], where=[=(TMP_0, 2)]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[word], select=[word, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[word]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[word], select=[word, Partial_SUM(frequency) AS sum$0]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[word, frequency])

TestCase.name: testSelectFromGroupedTableWithFunctionKey
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(TMP_0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{2}], TMP_0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1], k=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1], $f2=[org$apache$flink$table$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$MyHashCode$$dee8eec4e3bf3e21c3e7d3ee753495f1($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

Calc(select=[TMP_0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[$f2], select=[$f2, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f2]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[$f2], select=[$f2, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, c, MyHashCode$(c) AS $f2]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectFromGroupedTableWithNonTrivialKey
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(TMP_0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{2}], TMP_0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1], k=[$2]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$1], $f2=[UPPER($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

Calc(select=[TMP_0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[$f2], select=[$f2, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS TMP_0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f2]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[$f2], select=[$f2, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, c, UPPER(c) AS $f2]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSimpleSelect
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
Calc(select=[a, b]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testSelectFunction
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(_c0=[AS(org$apache$flink$table$plan$batch$table$CalcTest$MyHashCode$$dee8eec4e3bf3e21c3e7d3ee753495f1($2), '_c0')], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
Calc(select=[MyHashCode$(c) AS _c0, b]) +- BoundedDataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c, d])
